notes:
Appeared during [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary|Tibia's 15th]] and [[Tibia's 20th Anniversary|20th Anniversary]] celebrations as well as on January 7 and 8, 2018 (unintended), in a raid at a random time once a day.
The following message will appear:
{{Server Message|A troll is happily trolling the Orc Fortress - somebody call the CMs!}}
Then, 20 minutes later she will spawns:
{{Server Message|Mirade and Rejana have assumed control of the Orc Fortress!}}
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|?}}|{{Ability|Healing Confetti Explosion|200-300 heals near creatures|element=healing}} }}
history: During [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary]], Rejana used to spawn on the plains south of [[Thais]] around {{Mapper Coords|126.81|126.79|7|1|text=here}} with [[Mirade (Creature)|Mirade]] and [[Tjured (Creature)|Tjured]]. She was also immune to [[Physical Damage|Physical]] and [[Magical Damage]]s.
name: Rejana (Creature)
